content:
I'd be happy to help you enroll in the "Explainable AI for Business" course by IBM on Coursera. Here's the information you need to get started:

**Enrollment:**

1. Go to the Coursera website ([www.coursera.org](http://www.coursera.org)) and create an account if you don't already have one.
2. Search for "Explainable AI for Business" in the search bar.
3. Click on the course title to access the course page.
4. Click the "Enroll" button to enroll in the course.

**Course Schedule:**

The "Explainable AI for Business" course is a self-paced online course, which means you can start and complete the course at your own pace. The course is divided into 4 weeks, with each week covering a specific topic. You can complete the course in 4 weeks, or take more time if needed.

**Pricing:**

The "Explainable AI for Business" course is part of the IBM Data Science Professional Certificate on Coursera. You can enroll in the course as part of the certificate program or as a standalone course.

**Pricing Options:**

1. **Audit the course for free**: You can audit the course for free, which means you'll have access to the course materials, but you won't receive a certificate or graded assignments.
2. **Single course purchase**: You can purchase the course individually for $49.
3. **IBM Data Science Professional Certificate**: You can enroll in the IBM Data Science Professional Certificate program, which includes the "Explainable AI for Business" course, as well as 8 other courses, for $39/month.

**Certificate:**

Upon completing the course, you'll receive a certificate from IBM and Coursera, which you can add to your resume, LinkedIn profile, or other professional platforms.

**Support:**

Coursera offers various support options, including:

1. **Course forums**: You can ask questions and interact with instructors and peers in the course forums.
2. **Email support**: You can contact Coursera's support team via email for technical issues or general questions.
3. **Mobile app**: You can access the course materials and complete assignments on the Coursera mobile app.

I hope this information helps you get started with the "Explainable AI for Business" course by IBM on Coursera. Good luck with your learning journey!
